T02D2622:121b-0: @121b gtor ma'i cho ga /'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2622:121b-1: yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang //
T02D2622:121b-2: dpag bsam shing chen rgyas 'dra ste //
T02D2622:121b-3: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog / sems can kun don byed la 'dud //
T02D2622:121b-4: gtor ma'i rim pa bshad par bya //
T02D2622:121b-5: dang po lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i sngags pas
T02D2622:121b-6: rin po che'i snod mdzes pa'i nang du kha zas
T02D2622:121b-7: kyi 'byor pa dri dang kha dog dang ldan pa
T02D2622:121b-9: gtor ma'i nang du yi ge aa las yid bzhin
T02D2622:121b-10: gyi nor bu 'bar ba zla ba'i steng du rnam
T02D2622:121b-11: par bsams la / de las bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dang /
T02D2622:121b-12: 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis rnam par spras pas snod
T02D2622:121b-13: dang bcud chos kyi dbyings khyab par bsam zhing bsgom
T02D2622:121b-14: pa ni / yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang //
T02D2622:121b-15: khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi gdugs //
T02D2622:121b-17: bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i dh'i:las /
T02D2622:121b-18: dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste //
T02D2622:121b-19: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog / ces bya
T02D2622:121b-20: ba ni dpag bsam gyi shing nam mkha'i mtha' dang
T02D2622:121b-21: mnyam pa bum pa bdud rtsis bkang ba'i 'bras bu
T02D2622:121b-22: smin pa bdud rtsi rnam par 'dzag pa'o //
T02D2622:121b-23: gtor ma'i rgyud rgyas par bsam mo //
T02D2622:121b-24: thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis ye shes bdud rtsi dbab ste gnyis su med par bsam mo //
T02D2622:121b-25: aa a'a sarba ta th'a ga hrii da ya /
T02D2622:121b-27: aom h'um hr'i:bha ga b'an dzny'a na murti b'a g'i
T02D2622:121b-28: shva ra ma h'a wa tsa sarba dharm'a ga ga
T02D2622:121b-29: na aa ma la su pa ri shuddha dharm'a dh'a
T02D2622:121b-30: tu aom a'a:h'um / zhes pas byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D2622:121b-31: sna tshogs gzugs can yid la skyes //
T02D2622:121b-32: 'jig rten gsum yang gzhon lus gcig / ces bya
T02D2622:121b-33: ba ni de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis yang
T02D2622:121b-34: dag pa'i sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa dang khams
T02D2622:121b-35: gsum gyi sems can thams cad bkug ste /
T02D2622:121b-36: de dag thams cad snying gar yi ge aa bkod pa'i 'od zer gyis rnam par sbyangs te /
T02D2622:121b-38: gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thob //
T02D2622:121b-39: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
T02D2622:121b-40: zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2622:122a-1: kyis lus dpag med sprul la mchod do //
T02D2622:122a-2: nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod dang //
T02D2622:122a-3: sems can kun yid tshim par byed //
T02D2622:122a-4: de ltar ljags kyi 'od zer gyis bdud rtsi'i rgyun la zhugs te /
T02D2622:122a-5: kun kyang tshim par dmigs shing 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyis tshim par bya'o //
T02D2622:122a-7: chos kyi spyin bdag chen po ste //
T02D2622:122a-8: mchod 'os ba stong 'os phyag gi gnas //
T02D2622:122a-9: zhes pas phreng ba'i sngags dang /
T02D2622:122a-10: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am /
T02D2622:122a-13: tshigs su bcad pa'i bstod pas chos kyi spyin pa bya'o //
T02D2622:122a-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2622:122a-15: shes rab kyis ni de thob shog / byang chub
T02D2622:122a-16: chen por bsngo zhing smon lam rgya chen por gdab
T02D2622:122a-17: / aom a'a:h'um zhes pas gshegs su gsol /
T02D2622:122a-18: pha rol phyin dang rgyud rnams ma lus dang //
T02D2622:122a-19: bder gshegs rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kyi //
T02D2622:122a-20: kun gyi gtso bor khyab pas thugs la gnas //
T02D2622:122a-21: ye shes lus can mtshan don rgya che bas //
T02D2622:122a-22: sna tshogs tshul can bstod kyis deng 'dir bdag gis 'dir //
T02D2622:122a-23: dam pa'i gdams ngag nyer ba stan rnal 'byor lam dang spyar /
T02D2622:122a-24: spyar ba 'di la dge ba gang yod 'dis //
